tasks.test: deno task macro-test && deno task js-interop-test && operator-test && hql-syntax-test
tasks.macro-test: deno task test-do && deno task test-and && deno task test-or && deno task test-not && deno task test-defn && deno task test-cond && deno task test-import-export && deno task quote-quasiquote-tests
tasks.quote-quasiquote-tests: deno task test-quote && deno task test-quasiquote
tasks.js-interop-test: deno test --allow-all test/macro/js_interop_test.ts && deno task test-import-export
